        <script><![CDATA[(function executeRule(current, previous /*null when async*/) {
	if(current.default_connector && !current.active) {
		gs.addErrorMessage(gs.getMessage("Default configuration connector cannot be inactive"));
		current.setAbortAction(true);
		return;
	}
	//Handle active flag changes
	if(current.active.changesTo(true)) {
		if(areOthersDefault().getRowCount() === 0)
			current.default_connector = true;
	}
	
	//Handle default changes
	if(!current.isNewRecord() && current.default_connector.changesTo(false)) {
		if(getOtherActiveConnectors() > 0) {
			gs.addErrorMessage(gs.getMessage("Please select other active configuration as default before removing current one as default"));
			current.setAbortAction(true);
			return;
		}
		else {
			current.active = false;
		}
	} else if(current.default_connector.changesTo(true)) {
		current.active = true;
		setOthersNonDefault();
	}
	
	function setOthersNonDefault() {
		var gr = new GlideRecord("sentiment_connector_config");
		gr.addQuery("sys_id", '!=', current.getUniqueValue());
		gr.query();
		gr.setValue('default_connector', false);
		gr.setWorkflow(false);
		gr.updateMultiple();
	}
	
	function areOthersDefault() {
		var gr = new GlideRecord("sentiment_connector_config");
		gr.addQuery("default_connector", "true");
		gr.addQuery("sys_id", '!=', current.getUniqueValue());
		gr.query();
		return gr;
	}
	
	function totalRecordsCount() {
		var gr = new GlideRecord("sentiment_connector_config");
		gr.query();
		return gr.getRowCount();
	}
	
	function getOtherActiveConnectors() {
		var gr = new GlideRecord("sentiment_connector_config");
		gr.addActiveQuery();
		gr.addQuery("sys_id", '!=', current.getUniqueValue());
		gr.query();
		return gr.getRowCount();
	}
	
})(current, previous);]]></script>
